title: Juventus loses midfielders Pereyra and Asamoah to injury
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer: Sports - Today 
Juventus midfielder Roberto Pereyra will be sidelined for more than a month with a muscular problem, and teammate Kwadwo Asamoah has had ano...
